abstract.t: This document specifies a data model for managing Sieve scripts on a server using JMAP. Open Issues o Do we need/want both "content" and "blobId" in the SieveScript object? It may be simpler to have just one way of specifying content and "blobId" is more versatile and doesn't require JSON- encoding of the content. Furthermore, use of the forthcoming(?) Blob/set method would avoid the extra roundtrip of having to upload the blob first. o Should changes made by onSuccessActivateScript be reported in the response to the client-initiated request, or via a second implicit SIeveScript/set response? o The strawman for SieveScript/test only uses blobIds. Will this have to change once the issue regarding content/blobId in SieveScript is resolved?
